Text:
Great movie!
A few years ago I tried several times to rip and encode this one from a dvd and make it watchable lol. I got frustrated and gave up, so thank you for this.

Hi Twentyforty,
Thanks a lot for sharing your constant unique piece-of-art encodes/uploads...+1...A10-V10...
Special thanks to the man behind this work...and subs...
I am grateful...so i donated...
Spirit...
:D
